name: Zombie Enforcer – Killer of Lifeless Human
name_original: Zombie Enforcer – Killer of Lifeless Human
description:
Zombie Enforcer is a augmented reality game where you have to find and shoot deadly zombies

around your real world.Now’s your chance to discover and kill all zombies around you.Get your

shoes on, step outside, and explore the world.

First time in the history of gaming world. Here comes the Augmented reality game which you

never played before. Be aware !! They are thirsty for blood,hijack your body,disable your immune

system,They can be any where like in you kitchen,bathroom,library,school office any where into

the real world.

Join Trainers across the globe who are discovering Zombie as they explore the world around them.

Black zombie, Fat zombie, Strong zombie, thirsty zombie, and many other Zombies have been

discovered!

You can play Zombie Enforcer anywhere and anytime. But remember there is no chance of weak

heart person to this game.

Lost of zombies are out there, and you need to find them. As you walk around a neighborhood,

your smartphone will vibrate when there’s a Zombie nearby.Take aim and shoot at them !!...

You’ll have to stay alert,it might kill you !! Zombie Enforcer game is using latest technology of

augmented reality. Share your high score in Facebook

As you level up, you’ll be able to kill more-powerful Zombie to increase your experience and

skill..

This is not a normal game where you can just play the game but Zombie Enforcer is real time

zombie shooting game in real world. You need to shoot Zombie before they start to attack on

you.That’s the only option for you to survive and clean your home from deadly zombies.

It’s time to get moving—your real-life adventures await!. Kill this Zombie or be the part of it. The choice is yours.
